verses.verse: <S%G3063>Furthermore<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> we <S%G2065>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, that <S%G2531>as<s%> you have <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>so<s%> you would <S%G4052>abound<s%> more and <S%G3123>more<s%>.

<S%G3588>That<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> man go <S%G5233>beyond<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4122>defraud<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> any <S%G4229>matter<s%>: because <S%G1360>that<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is the <S%G1558>avenger<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5130>such<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4277>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G4277>forewarned<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1263>testified<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> brotherly <S%G5360>love<s%> you <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> that I <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> taught by <S%G2312>God<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1063>indeed<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> we <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, that you <S%G4052>increase<s%> more and <S%G3123>more<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> that you <S%G5389>strive<s%> to be <S%G2270>quiet<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> your own <S%G2398>business<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2038>work<s%> <S%G2398>with<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> we <S%G3853>commanded<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>;

<S%G2443>That<s%> you may <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2156>honestly<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that you may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>lack<s%> of <S%G3367>nothing<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to be <S%G50>ignorant<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G4012>concerning<s%> them which are <S%G2837>asleep<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G3076>sorrow<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3062>others<s%> which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> we <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> which are <S%G2198>alive<s%> and <S%G4035>remain<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5348>shall<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5348>precede<s%> them which are <S%G3756>asleep<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> shall <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G2752>shout<s%>, <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G743>archangel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4536>trump<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>:

<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> which are <S%G2198>alive<s%> and <S%G4035>remain<s%> shall be caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3507>clouds<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G529>meet<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall <S%G2071>we<s%> <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
